page.title: 12Adult Leisure, Woking.
page.content: The Adult Education Centre in Grange Road runs day and evening courses in many subjects including French,German, Bridge, Flower arranging, Computer Studies and Dress making & Tailoring. Many adults are members of the Woking Music Society, choirs and orchestras. They go to concerts in London, Guildford and Woking itself. Some have begun taking music lessons. Golf is a popular recreation among the more well to do,some of whom have private swimming pools. There are several golf courses in the area.The New Zealand Golf Club has a typical 18 hole Surrey heathland course. Good use is made of the Sheerwater Athletics Ground and of the Sports facilities at the Leisure Centre and Centre Pools in Woking itself. Fishing is a popular hobby and there are tackle shops in the area.
